Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: overdue \o"ver*due"\, a. Due and more than due; delayed beyond the proper time of arrival, payment, return, etc.; as, an overdue vessel; an overdue note; a book overdue at the library; an overdue payment. [1913 Webster +PJC]
overdue adj : past due; not paid at the scheduled time; "an overdue installment"; "a delinquent account" [syn: {delinquent}]
